name: Game Concept Jam
room: UBC Game Dev / VGDC Discords (More info coming!)
description: A cross-campus game jam where you present a game concept at the end, rather than making a game prototype. Voting happens at the end, and the community decides the winner! More info coming about the intro and outro livestreams for the event soon. Check out the Discord servers for more info!

name: Intro to Music Scoring
description: Learn the basics of music scoring! We will go through how to navigate sound mixing software, as well as understanding the abilities of DAWs (digital audio workstations). Join us in general-voice on Discord!
